text: Sion Airport (Military: LSMS) is the airport of the city of Sion, Switzerland.Priceline It is 2.5 km southwest of the city of Sion in the Rh√¥ne Valley.Piste25 The airport was opened in 1935. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Category:1930s establishments in Switzerland Category:1935 establishments in Europe Category:Airports in Switzerland Category:Sion, Switzerland
